name: SCI-FI-Yonara!
description:
The end of the world is pre-scheduled and taken care of, so you don't have to worry. Such is the beauty of Obsolescence dates: let the Int-Fed take care of all the messy work, so you can book an evacuation ticket ahead of time and relax with the knowledge that you've spent a planet's prescribed lifetime well.

Esehu is not dying. Esehu is merely Obsolete. And you, dear citizen, remember it all. You know what they say: first farewells are always the hardest. Good thing the crew of the Donki already has a few under their belts.


Created for the Twine Sci-Fi Jam.
